description: Lately, it is crashing on saving on fedora 35.
summary: Crashes as soon as i hit the save button

description: Lovely and the design is so good. Yet, crashes a lot on Fedora 35 Wayland as one other user stated. And I don't know why but a Bash script didn't run when I wrote it in Spyder, saying there was a syntax error even though there wasn't but worked well by just copy/paste with Atom. Maybe my mistake or my configuration, yet it's still weird. I tried and used the Windows version and it was great there. Maybe better to use with other Linux distros apart from Fedora Wayland.
summary: would recommend but with Fedora some issues

description: This should not be included in the store if it can't even start up without instantly crashing.

Looked ok, to install; doesn't remove from the system. Unfriendly. Do No instsll. It would be great if the program actually did anything, but it does nothing but act like a virus that doesn't want to install.

Version 5.5.19 installed from the Debian 12 (Stable, Bookworm) with Gnome desktop. Just one issue where it reports that the dependency for pylsp_black >= 1.2.0 is not installed even though 1.2.1 is installed.
summary: Good Python IDE with a lot of features

description: this is awesome. I like it for its fast respons, theme and library support
maybe I'm missing something, but I've installed this on fedora 39 and I can't get it to open when I click on the app icon
There is no information available to install the pip package. Pip binary install the rest of the modules of python. So, how to install sympy?

Una vez instalado desde la tienda abran una terminal y actualicen a la versión 5.5.1 para resolver el problema:

$ pip install --upgrade spyder
I cannot add python path for IPython console. This is not a container based application.
